tool_description: aztro API - Get daily horoscope!  100% Free & Open Source | Astrology API by Sameer Kumar
name: aztro
title: aztro

api_list.name: Fetch Horoscope Information
api_list.description: Provides horoscope info for sun signs such as Lucky Number, Lucky Color, Mood, Color, Compatibility with other sun signs, description of a sign for that day, etc.

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description:
Possible values for \"day\":
- today
- yesterday
- tomorrow

required_parameters.name: sign
required_parameters.description:
List of possible values of \"sign\":
- Aries
- Taurus
- Gemini
- Cancer
- Leo
- Virgo
- Libra
- Scorpio
- Sagittarius
- Capricorn
- Aquarius
- Pisces
